title: JavaScript: Export conferences button freezes in 'clicked mode'
body_html:
/orga/conferences
After clicking the download button, the button is disabled, and that is a good thing. After the download is completed, the button doesn't jump back to enabled state. That is not so good...

This looks related to the javascript, so you can solve the js, OR use the submit button option disable_with instead.
Whatever you think is best or easiest :-)
body_text:
/orga/conferences

Whatever you think is best or easiest :-)
body:
/orga/conferences
After clicking the download button, the button is disabled, and that is a good thing.  After the download is completed, the button doesn't jump back to enabled state. That is not so good...

This looks related to the javascript, so you can solve the js, OR use the submit button option `disable_with` instead.
Whatever you think is best or easiest :-)
